name: get_sys_info
description: Check a whole bunch of information all at once including /etc/release, uname -a, hostname, ip addr, /etc/hosts, uptime, free -mh, df -h, systemctl --failed, ss -tunalp, email info, terminal settings, date and time, current user id, home, and working directory info.

rand_int.description: A random integer to help prevent caching.
